name: Tom Treece
text: Our company asked Christy's to do a job for us.  Christy's exceeded ALL our expectations.  They did an excellent job, did it promptly, and cleaned up.  We are fortunate to have such a high quality flooring company in Hazel Green.  We recommend Christy's to everyone and will call them for all future flooring work we have.  Thank you to Christy and her staff!

name: Kristin Wilt
text: Amazing customer service! I went in for the first time last Friday and Christy was SO helpful and so friendly. She answered all of my questions before I even knew how to ask them! Looking forward to working with them! Highly recommend if you are looking for someone that knows their stuff and is just so down to earth.

name: Tricia Darty
text: Bought flooring from Christy's Flooring today. Great prices and quality. Excellent customer service. Would highly recommend this.business!

resp.text: Thank You

name: Coach Pat
text: By far the best in the business. She treats you like family and she's much more knowledgeable than others in this field. I won't buy anywhere else.

resp.text: Thank You

name: lars lars
text: Good folks to talk to and get flooring options and ideas.  Reasonably priced flooring

resp.text: Thank You

name: Melissa Pogue
text: Great customer service!  Christy is great to work with.  She has a great selection, eager to help, and is generous to her community!  Buy local!

resp.text: Thank You

name: Greg Duke
text: We have used Christy thrice now for carpet and vinyl. She does great business and employs excellent installers. Can't beat the quality and price!

resp.text: Thank You

name: Terrie Quick
text: Really nice flooring and extra good people... give them a call or go check out what this store has to offer!

resp.text: Thank You

name: Ray Roland
text: Best place to buy flooring

name: EVERYTHING CHILDERS
text: Nice

resp.text: Thank You
Thank you

name: Jeanie Shea
text: I ordered two custom floating shelves for my newly updated kitchen and was very pleased with how they turned out. I was able to select the type of wood, the stain color and a grey wash along with a texture that finished off my shelves. The owner and his side-kick were knowledgeable, helpful and had my shelves ready on time. Be sure to check this place out if looking for a fireplace mantel, beans for your ceiling and lots of other types of wood uses.

name: Tray Wilson
text: Very professional and very nice wood

name: Jessica Wilson
text: I am an employee at River Bottom Pine and take it from me, there is no better place to the best quality hard wood floors and meet the best people. Everyone there not only cares about your business but they care about you as well.

name: Philip Flores
text: The best wood flooring and custom beam mill in the south east! Very friendly beautiful craftsman’s live edge tables. Very nice selection of custom barn doors. Highly recommend! Philip Flores

name: Wesley Meier
text: Amazing company! Great products!

name: Eddie Parker
text: We could not be happier with the work we had done by Juan and his crew. They showed up every day right on time and stayed as long as it took to complete the job. They take great pride in their work and will not quit until everything is done just right. We would defiantly use them again.

resp.text: Colossians 3:23 And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord and not unto men.  Blessings my friends.

name: Erik Marsh
text: I wanted to let you know how pleased I am with the job well done at home. My bathroom looks astonishing. I really love what you did with the floor. I will certainly call you again to help me with my next project. Keep up the great work! Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you Erik. God Bless youns.

name: Pete Sutton
text: I turned to these people for the installation of the new tiles for my bathroom. They did an amazing job, and I am glad to have hired them. I would also like to recommend them to anyone who needs to turn to capable and reliable professionals. Thank you for everything, and keep it up!

resp.text: Thank you Pete. God Bless youns.

name: Jason Marshall
text: Juan and his crew installed flooring for us and did a great job!  Communication and services were excellent! I would definitely use them again.

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity to install your flooring, Jason. God Bless you and your family.

name: Leo Adams
text: I hired these people for the installation of my new ceramic tiles, and I must say that they did a great job. I would gladly recommend them to anyone who wants to hire capable and experienced professionals. Thank you for everything, and keep it up!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. God Bless youns.

name: Nicky Heinzen
text: Juan and his folks have done a wonderful job for me and I will continue to use them for my home and office. He saved my garage and even noticed mistakes that another contractor made that would have made the floor fall on my car. I can't thank him and his workers enough for the hard work and professionalism.

resp.text: Thank you Nicky. Blessings.

name: Howard Miller
text: They are a reliable tile contractor that did good work in our home. We highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you my friend. God Bless you.

name: Jonathan Camino
text: Very professional ceramic tile replacement service. Their work is great. Will call you again soon.

resp.text: Thanks and God Bless you my friend.

name: Harold Burkett
text: Super nice guys and they do great work. Installed tile in my kitchen and dining room. They were very informative and helpful. Great job guys and thanks.

name: Victoria Davis
text: New Life Refinishing renovated two bathroom vanities for me. They arrived when they said they would and kept us informed of when they would be returning. They spent hours sanding the vanities down to the wood, inside and out, then applied the base coat and paint in the color I selected. Even though the refinishing of the bases was done on-site, they did not make a mess or create a lot of dust. Doors and drawers were refinished at their shop. The finished vanities are even nicer than I expected. The pictures below show the cabinets before (white) and after (grey) refinishing. I recommend this company to anyone needing cabinets refinished.

resp.text: Thanks so much for sharing your experience!

name: Amanda Arthur
text: Had our front door refinished and it looks great! Highly recommend!

name: Sonja Mathis
text: New Life did an excellent job repairing an antique dresser for me. Thankful to Nick for the great work! So glad to have my Grandmother’s dresser back with me in much better condition. I can’t even tell where the repair was! Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words!

name: Beth Marshall
text: Rather than purchasing new cabinets for our home, we decided to contact New Life Refinishing to have them painted. They came recommended from a friend. I was worried that the cabinets would look "painted" since we were going from a light wood color to grays and blues. I cannot begin to describe how amazing the final product is. Not only is the workmanship exemplary, but the staff is also. They were punctual, easy to work with, an even entertained our high maintenance cat who wanted to be in the center of the work. I would HIGHLY recommend New Life Refinishing!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind review!! We really enjoyed you guys!!!

name: Adam & Avery Tuley
text: We are very impressed with the service provided by New Life Refinishing. They were professional and extremely humble about their expertise. The turn around time was quick and they provide delivery services. Super reasonable price! The quality of the finished table exceeded our expectations. We will forever be grateful to New Life Refinishing for giving our family dining room table a new life!

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to share that!

name: Jody Charland
text: All I can say is "WOW" my wife loves this piece now!  She says it looks exactly like she remembered when she went to her grandmas house when she was a little girl.  I only wish I had some before photos to show you.  Nick took it from a failed restoration(heavy varnish), separated joints, broken drawer floor and so many Knicks , dents and scratches to a beautiful desk again.  My wife thanks you Nick and the rest of your crew.  Not gonna lie, I got some KUDOS for finding a great place to do the work!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great feedback!

name: Dianne Debter
text: My door is beautiful!!! A contractor, who had previously been to my house came by. He smiled really big and said, “Your door is brand new! Looks great!” He is right my door looks new! What a fantastic job! I am SO pleased! It all went so well!Nick follows through as planned and does quality work!  👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻😄Thank you Nick!😄

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words!

name: Sonya Brasher
text: Our door looks absolutely beautiful!  Nick was very professional and polite. I would highly recommend New Life Refinishing for your next project !!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind review!

name: Pete Hudson
text: I am thrilled with my "new" kitchen table!  I had the table top of my grandmother's dining table refinished, and it is better than I ever remember it being!  I can't remember what type of finish Nick said he used, but he said it is very durable.  And it is SO SMOOTH!  I just want to pet it every time I walk by.  It is beautiful!  I'm looking forward to making new memories with it now!  Also, I had previously re-caned a few of the chairs and needed them to be stained to match the others, and they look perfectly matched!  Very happy customer here!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review!  The finish is a 2k Polyurethane

name: Ray Toth
text: Great experience with NLR! From my first contact through completion of the refinishing of our front doors, they were outstanding.  Very professional, friendly, and responsive.  I would absolutely recommend them for your refinishing needs.

resp.text: Thanks for your business and the awesome review!

name: Kevin Call
text: Our live edge table turned out beautifully. They did an amazing job!! Highly recommend!! You wont be disappointed!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words and for the opportunity to work on your beautiful table. It is one of our favorite pieces we've worked on!

name: Jake Glombowski
text: Nick refinished an old dining room table for my wife and I. We inherited table from my wife's grandmother, so it had a lot of sentimental value. The table was made with white pine and has a lot of character and curves. However, it is old and had a lot of wear and tear, so it needed a lot of work. We wanted a somewhat dark gray table to go in our new home, but we were nervous that the white pine dining table couldn't be refinished to match what we wanted and we would have to pay for a brand new table. Nick blew us away with what he was able to do to stain and darken the white pine table. It took him a couple weeks to work on it and us viewing the table's progress. It was well worth the wait, and we love our newly refinished dining room table!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words!

name: Terry Patterson
text: Nick and the rest of the guys did a fantastic job on refinishing our kitchen cabinets.  They were focused on delivering a perfect job and when the initial sanding did not meet their expectations, they re-sanded every cabinet to make it right.  They communicated well during the entire process.  They also  did a great job cleaning up after the job was completed.  I would highly recommend them for any refinishing job.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind review and for your business, we really appreciate it!

name: Robert Guzowski
text: Great quality work and craftsmanship.  I would trust them again with a family heirloom.  Great communication during the process, we couldn't have asked for more.  And they pick up and drop off to boot!  You just can't beat that.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words!

name: Grace Johnson
text: Nick and his team are very professional and great to work with and I would highly recommend them. We recently bought our first home and wanted to change the cabinet color.  The kitchen cabinets were stained a cherry-redish color, and we wanted them to be a darker espresso color. New Life Refinishing took our existing cabinets and re-stained them for a fraction of the price you might pay to reface cabinets. Nick and his team did an excellent job, and our 20 year old cabinets look almost brand new. Nick took one of our doors to try sample colors, and when we didn't like the first color, he started over and tried a different color that we liked. They really want to make sure that you are happy with the product. They taped our entire kitchen off and did a great job ensuring there was no mess. I will be using them again when I want to re-stain my bathroom cabinets.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the awesome review, we really appreciate it and your business.  Thanks!

name: Philip Panagos
text: NLR did a perfect job removing the finish on a nearly 80 year old mahogany end table, so it's ready for an oil finish.  Will definitely go back to them in the future.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the nicer review and your business!

name: Wendy Smythe
text: Great experience. They showed up when expected and did an excellent job.  We are very happy with the work.

resp.text: Great to hear, thanks so much for the review!

name: WordWashed Wife
text: New Life Refinishing is a first class refinishing company!  They are all artists and the finished work in my house is simply beautiful!  They repainted my cabinets, mantle, front door and refinished a Hutch I'd had for 20 years.  I love it all.  Great group of guys - Drew, NIck, Robert, Will and Luke were all extremely professional.  They showed up when they said they would and delivered the product on the day promised!  Highly recommend this company!  It was a pleasure working with them.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review and your business, we really appreciate it!

name: Cassy Reeves
text: Nick did an excellent job painting our built in bookcase in our living room.  Bookcase was wood colored and he sanded and applied a white lacquer paint.  Great guy to work with and he did a wonderful job.  Job was finished quickly and around our busy schedules.  😊  I had also just painted our walls in that room and I didn't even have to do touch up paint after the project was done.  Awesome job!  Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Cassy and thank you for your business!

name: Lois Jones
text: I can't remember the last time something/anything exceeded my expectations- this kitchen cabinet makeover has! It is above and beyond what I have always wanted/dreamed of. So thankful that my daughter found Drew and his amazing team (especially Rob- he is just awesome!). They are the most incredibly talented craftsmen. Their attention to even the most minute detail is beyond comprehension. They even take their clean up process to the next level. Absolutely no aspect of this process was neglected. You would expect to pay a premium price for work of this caliber, but the best part, you don't! The price for all of this perfection is extremely fair and beyond reasonable. They are an absolute pleasure to work with. Oh, and did I mention that my 15 year old cabinets feel like silk...because they do! 😊

resp.text: Thank you so much! We really appreciate the opportunity that you gave us and the kind words! Your hospitality was amazing. Thanks again!!

name: Kerri Call
text: Overwhelmingly  pleased with the service as well as the quality of the end product. I had kitchen cabinets painted from boring brown wood finish to beautifully painted cabinets that brighten the extremely dark kitchen.  New Life updated worn drawer slides and installed new hardware that I ordered. From quote, time estimated to complete the job, to final invoice the service was outstanding.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review and your business Kerri!

name: Blake Williams
text: New Life Refinishing recently refinished our oak kitchen cabinets and they turned out great. They did a fantastic job and we couldn’t be happier with the finished product. They finished the job in about 5 days and left our kitchen spotless. Very good company and I highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks so much Mr. Williams for the kind review!

name: Gx Mx
text: This company is unbelievably professional!  I was very impressed with their quick response to my initial contact.  I was equally impressed with the solutions Nick recommended for my furniture and the reasonable estimate costs.  Nick kept me informed every step of the process.  I am very pleased with the quality craftsmanship given to my china cabinet and table.  I highly recommend New Life Refinishing.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review and your business, we really appreciate it!

name: Kathy Stampley
text: New Life Refinishing provided us a reasonable price, delivered on time as scheduled, and the workmanship was exceptional.  We could not be more pleased with the work that was done.  I would highly recommend this company and we will use them again in the near future. Very professional and does excellent work!

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to share your experience Mrs. Stampley!

name: T. V.
text: I had a wonderful experience with New Life Refinishing! I wanted to change my kitchen from oak to white which can be very tricky to do without looking tacky.  I found his website by doing a google search for refinishing kitchen cabinets.  Nick came over and gave me an estimate right away.  He has a very warm personality and is immediately likeable.  I knew after talking to him about his process and reviewing his photos on his website that I had found the right person to do the job.  He kept me in the loop through the whole thing.  He comes over when he says he will and calls beforehand, he finishes the job when he says he will.  He took my cabinet doors and drawer faces back to his shop and sprayed them there.  He came into my house and sprayed the actual cabinets and surrounds.  The whole process took under a week and I was amazed at how stunning the kitchen cabinets came out.  I can't stop looking at the kitchen without saying WOW!  His attention to detail and the quality and craftsmanship is beyond compare.  I would highly recommend New Life Refinishing to anyone and would ask him to do any future work!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to write this review Theresa.  It was a pleasure working with you!

name: Christina Sirten
text: Drew, Nick and Will were all great. Nick was very patient and helpful in helping me choose a color. They are very professional and finished my cabinets in the time quoted. I highly recommend New Life refinishing.

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to review our company, and thanks for your business!

name: Debbie Schumann
text: Very pleased with the repainting of our bathroom cabinet drawers and doors.  They did an excellent job matching the original paint.  Very professional and responsive.  I would definitely use them again!

resp.text: Thanks for the review and your business!

name: Joe Harless
text: Nick and Will gave us great service in our recent need for staining and finishing the furniture we are using in our church auditorium renovation. They worked to match the stain on our pews and even repaired a badly damaged arm on one of our pews detailing the grain for a perfect match to the original grain and color. The service was fast and we highly recommend New Life Refinishing and will be using them again for any future needs. Thanks guys for all you did for us - Joe H.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words Mr. Harless, it was a pleasure working with you!

name: Erin Atkins
text: I couldn’t be happier with the way my table turned out! I told Nick what I had envisioned, and he and his team made it a reality. New Life was easy to communicate with and worked quickly to complete the refinishing job. Will definitely hire them again!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review!

name: Angela Arguello
text: Nick at New Life repaired and refinished several handmade pieces of furniture for us that were damaged in our last move. We had six dining room chairs, an expandable table, a pub table and a twin bed headboard that needed to be completely rebuilt. Nick did a wonderful job on everything for us and he had it all completed quickly. He looked at other furniture that was damaged and made on the spot repairs for us. We still have a few pieces that we are considering getting refinished and we'll only have Nick at New Life Refinishing complete it for us.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words Angela, and thanks for your business!

name: Janice Kelly
text: Outstanding service. Repaired my damaged (corner) of my dining room table to PERFECTION! Matched the finish FLAWLESSLY. Professional service. Will definitely use again. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words!! We enjoyed working on your table.

name: Carmen Wright
text: I really appreciated the quick responses to any questions i had. All the team members were very professional and the finished product looks fantastic!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind review!

name: Jonathan Powell (JP)
text: These guys do amazing work! Nobody works harder than these guys! They charge a fair price for the top notch quality they provide. Money well spent on preserving things you want to keep and pass down to your kids. Highly recommended!!!

resp.text: Thanks for the review Jonathan!  We really appreciate it!

name: Edwin Rodriguez
text: Great job.  The renters I had tried to fix the cabinets on their own and made a mess. New life refinishing did a great job matching stain color to the rest of the cabinets.  The level of service is great and very timely.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words and your business!

name: Kevin Zurmuehlen
text: New Life Refinishing is our new go-to for all of our wood refinishing needs in our house! Nick is an honest and hard-worker who completes his tasks on time and at a great price. He refinished our 30 year old kitchen cabinets and made them look completely new. We are very happy and will recommend New Life Refinishing to all of our friends and associates.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review Kevin.  It was a pleasure working for you and your family!

name: Josh Novak
text: New Life Refinishing did an outstanding job in refinishing my old oak table. They made it look absolutely brand new! I highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review and your business!

name: Michele Banish
text: We left town for a Christmas Holiday and returned to a new kitchen.  We left Nick and Drew to do their best with 20 year old cabinets.  What we received was truely New Life.  Rather than paint, we had the guys strip,sand,and stain.  Lovely! I'd say it looks like a brand new kitchen adding tenfold the value of the modest investment in the work.  On time. Trustworthy. Quality craftsmanship. They will be back to address our master bath!

resp.text: We absolutely had a blast working on your kitchen. Thanks so much for the kind review!! We hope you guys have a Happy New Year!!!

name: Dale Cox
text: Nick refinished all of our white kitchen cabinets as well as a new built in cabinet that we built.  The work was excellent and the price very reasonable.  Nick is a hard worker and makes sure that the job is done to the customer's satisfaction.  Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thanks for the review Dale! We really appreciate it!

name: Louise Holland
text: These guys did a fantastic job on my cabinets! They were prompt & called to let me know what the plan for the day would be. They finished in timely manner. I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you so much Mrs. Holland. You were such a pleasure to work for!

name: Deanna Loden
text: This company is so reliable, with prompt service and polite employees. They do beautiful work. They repaired and refinished our front door and we're very pleased with it. I highly recommend New Life Refinishing!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words and your business!

name: Laurel Moulden
text: Amazing work!!!  I had an old sideboard that belonged to my grandmother that sat in my basement for years. It was in desperate need of refinishing and repair. Thanks to the talented craftsmanship and TLC of New Life Refinishing, it is now my favorite piece in my house and sits proudly in my dining room, with a whole new generation to make memories with.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing Laurel, I had a blast working on your wonderful buffet!

name: andrea foust
text: I would highly recommend New Life Refinishing.  Nick has great attention to detail. He keeps you informed on his timeline as things go along.  Awesome .

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind review, and thanks for your business!

name: Jason Potts
text: Great experience. The quality of work was great. You can tell costumer satisfaction is important to these guys. The level of communication and flexability during the restoration process was perfect.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your business and the kind words!

name: David Dye
text: New Life is what our furniture got. We are so pleased. Our furniture that is over 50 years old looks better than brand new.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words!

name: Valarae Pfister
text: New Life Refinishing did a superior job of fixing my dearly beloved solid walnut hope chest (made by my father).  He does excellent work and has great service.  Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Val!

name: Lindsay Caro
text: We had several pieces of furniture painted and stained by New Life Refinishing. We had a dresser stained and a bookcase, bed and dresser all painted. He did an amazing, flawless job. We will definitely use New Life again for any of our furniture restoration needs.

resp.text: Thanks for your business and thank you for your kind words Lindsay!

name: Guisseli Reyes Turnell
text: Nick repaired a table that was damaged by our cleaning company. He was professional, on time, and the repairs turned out beautifully and better than expected. I highly recommend this business.

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to share your experience!

name: e swinney
text: We had our front door and side panels stained by New Life Refinishing. He did an amazing job. We will definitely use New Life again for any of our refinishing needs.

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to share your experience!  I really appreciate it!

name: Charles Phillips
text: His work was very good.  We got a quick turn around and he explained what a was done.  We will definitely use again.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your business and the kind review Mr. Phillips!

name: Linda McGuire
text: New Life Refinishing did a spectacular job on refinishing a heirloom  dining room set given to me by my mother. I appreciated not only the high quality of work they performed but the kindness and care expressed by the team.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words, it was an absolute pleasure working on your table and chairs!

name: Benjamin Cain
text: Professional and great at their craft. They can do it all, furniture repair, refinishing to name a few. Competitive price for the quality work they do.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Ben, we really appreciate it!

name: Richard Ehrenreich
text: I don't recall just how we were introduced to Nick, maybe from a newspaper insert. We called him and received an estimate to refinish an oak table with four chairs and a captain's chair, probably in excess of 25 years old with all the mars and scratches a table of that age would show, not to mention several moves while on active duty in the military.. His estimate was very reasonable, so we asked him to perform the work. To say that we were thrilled with the finished product is an extreme understatement. The set looked better than brand new. We then asked him to do a much harder job, refinishing a hard maple dining room pedestal table and four unmatching chairs (in finish and type of wood) in a stain to match a dining room china cabinet. To make matters even worse, one of the leg bases had been chewed on quite vigorously by a new puppy. Once again, Nick's work was unsurpassed and his estimate was right on. Before and after pictures can be seen on his web page. We are very pleased with his work and wouldn't ever consider anyone else for future work.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words and for your business, we really appreciate it!

name: Cathie Jones
text: New life Refinishing did an amazing job on our kitchen table top. I am so very pleased with not only his work, but also his estimate was the most reasonable.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Cathie!  Really appreciate your time and your business....thanks!

name: Carmen Valeria
text: We have had them refinish a coffee table, end table and a desk . Perfect every time! Very nice and professional!

resp.text: Thanks for your business and the kind words Carmen!

name: Kimberly (Crystin) Hunter
text: Great customer service!! Good work!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Crystin!

name: Scott Dewald
text: They refinished all of our cabinets and we couldn't be happier with the way they turned out. Would highly recommend this company for any cabinet work.

resp.text: Thanks Scott!  It was a pleasure working with you!

name: MJ Game
text: Really nice work!

resp.text: Thanks!

name: Janie Davis
text: AWESOME JOB on the Dining room table refinishing.

resp.text: Thank you Janie, we appreciate your business!

name: christine winters
text: Ed was very professional and the quality of the upholstery cleaning was amazing.  If they had a sixth star I would of chose that.  I highly recommend them for any cleaning services!!! Thank you Ed!!

name: Denise Alawine
text: We had the carpets and slate floor cleaned at our office. Spectacular job! Our floors were terrible! Ed is an actual wizard. No doubt. Very professional, efficient, and can apparently perform miracles. Highly recommend this company.

name: Amy Gerbig
text: Great service. They came and clean the carpets at work. They a great job with great rates. Most affordable!! Thank you

name: Essina Carter
text: What an amazing experience with a great local company!! My husband and I were both hesitant about trusting anyone to clean our hand scraped hardwood floors.. We could not have made a better choice in choosing Nurses Touch!! The husband and wife team were so knowledgeable and super friendly. I can be a stickler.. And I don’t have one complaint. Our floors look beautiful!!! I will be recommending them to all of our family and friends.

name: Jeremy Johnson
text: This company has great service! I have used them twice now, once for cleaning the carpets throughout my entire house and once for cleaning my mattress and carpet after my son spilled an entire cup of juice in my bed. Both times using them they were on time, thorough, and friendly. I highly recommend them.

name: Mitch Schenkel
text: Nurse's Touch did a fantastic job with our carpets when we were moving out! After years of dirt, grime and drink stains, the carpets looked like new. We also had them do a recliner of ours. Once they were done, it looked and smelled like the day we got it. "A" class company all the way from the first call to them, appointment setting, work itself and the customer service with a smile.

name: Deucejack
text: Ed did an amazing job cleaning our carpets!! He was super thorough and made sure he worked to get every stain up! We have three little ones and they are pretty rough on our carpet but now after Ed cleaned it, it looks brand new!! We won't be using anyone else ;)

name: Candice Williams
text: Called around 3pm and he arrived at 4pm. Very fast service for a work in. Carpet looks brand new!! And wasn't soggy like other companies have your floor.  Very nice and very Reasonable price. Thoroughly satisfied!!!!

name: Laurie Watson McKay
text: Great job! Made my carpets look brand new! Got rid of 20-year old stains! Great customer service and fantastic service. Highly recommend! Thanks Ed!

name: Brittany Sanford
text: Ed and Lesleigh are truly two amazing and very professional people. I am beyond pleased with my services. The were very informative , on time, friendly and just down right great genuine people. I googled around to find a company that could possibly do work on a Sunday. Upon my findings Nurse's Touch came up. I scheduled an appointment with Ed. The day of service came and I received a courtesy call from Lesleigh to inform me that they were in route. When they arrived the greeted with big smiles and a firm handshake. The results are amazing. I truly thank you guys for all of your hard work and I will be sending you more clients.

name: Juanita Seel
text: Carpets were so clean... they even cleaned my tile and it looked great. Professional, enthusiastic and thorough.

name: Kaleigh Pritchard
text: Very professional and reasonably priced! Removed all stains from our office carpet! 10/10 would recommend to anyone!

name: Trevor McFarlin
text: Excellent, professional service company. The difference in our house is night and day. Thanks again for your service! A+++

name: keith kilgore
